title.en: Kimi to Unmei ni Tsuite no Hanashi ga Shitai

altTitles.en: I want to talk about fate with you

altTitles.ja: 君と運命についての話がしたい

description.en: Even if we're both beta and even if we're not a fated pair, it'll be fine. Our relationship won't change, ever—Hibiki is a salaryman who has been living together with his high school sweetheart, Koushiro, for 10 years. When they had just met each other, they were convinced that they were a fated pair, but their gender tests revealed that they were both beta. Even though other gay couples can be blessed if they are a "fated pair," it vexes them they can't even hold hands in front of people. They tell themselves that if they love each other, all will be fine, but trivial things make them more anxious each day... But they hear about a misdiagnosis of the gender test one day...!?
description.fr:
Même si nous sommes tous les deux des betas et même si nous ne formons pas une paire prédestinée, tout ira bien. Notre relation ne changera jamais. Hibiki est un salarié qui vit avec son amour de lycée, Koushiro, depuis 10 ans. Lorsqu'ils venaient de se rencontrer, ils étaient convaincus d'être un couple prédestiné, mais leurs tests de genre ont révélé qu'ils étaient tous deux beta. Même si d'autres couples homosexuels peuvent être bénis s'ils forment une "paire prédestinée", ils sont vexés de ne pas pouvoir se tenir la main devant les gens. Ils se disent que s'ils s'aiment, tout ira bien, mais des choses insignifiantes les angoissent un peu plus chaque jour...

Mais un jour, ils entendent parler d'une erreur de diagnostic lors du test de genre... !?

description.en:
Only after losing my daughter and husband did I realize how twisted the world was. By some miracle, I was given a second chance at life. This time I will only live for myself.

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%B9%A8%EB%AC%B5%EC%9D%98-%EC%A0%95%EC%9B%90/2129)
description.ko:
나는 생전에 누군가의 아내이자 어머니로서 헌신하며 살았다.
사랑하지는 않았지만 존경했던 남편. 
나와는 피 한 방울 섞이지 않았으나 사랑해마지않던 딸.
두 사람은 내 세계를 이루는 전부였다.
분명 그랬었는데.
“난 그저 내 딸과 가정을 돌볼 여자가 필요했어.”
“연고 없는 너는 내게 장난감일 뿐이야.”
두 사람이 죽고 나서야 나는 비로소 내 세계가 뒤틀렸다는 걸 알았다.
평생 남을 위해 살다가 두 번째로 주어진 삶.
이번 생은 나를 위해 쓰기로 했다.
그러니 이제는 너희 차례야.

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%B9%A8%EB%AC%B5%EC%9D%98-%EC%A0%95%EC%9B%90/2129)

altTitles.ja: ベルガモット＆サニーデイ

description.en:
Café worker Riku has just been dumped... again. Despite always giving relationships his all, Riku can't seem to ever make it past the three-month milestone in any relationship. And then there's Josh, the handsome, wealthy owner of the café who seems to have it all together. When Riku wakes up in Josh's bed after what he can only assume is a consolation rebound, Josh shockingly suggests continuing a no-strings-attached fling.

Fooling around with a rich man... will they drink champagne in a jacuzzi? Riku has no idea, but he's not going to turn it down!
description.fr:
Riku, employé d'un café, vient de se faire larguer... une nouvelle fois. Bien qu'il se soit toujours donné à fond dans ses relations, Riku n'arrive jamais à passer le cap des trois mois de relation. Et puis il y a Josh, le beau et riche propriétaire du café qui semble avoir tout compris. Lorsque Riku se réveille dans le lit de Josh après ce qu'il ne peut que supposer être un rebond de consolation, Josh suggère de façon choquante de poursuivre une aventure sans attaches.

S'amuser avec un homme riche... est-ce qu'ils vont boire du champagne dans un jacuzzi ? Riku n'en a aucune idée, mais il ne va pas refuser !

title.en: Maoyuu Maou Yuusha - "Kono Watashi no Mono Tonare, Yuusha yo" "Kotowaru!"

altTitles.es: Archienemigo y Héroe - "Se mío héroe" "Me niego"

altTitles.pt: Arqui-inimigo e Herói - "Seja meu Herói!" "Eu me recuso!"

altTitles.en: Maoyuu Maou Yuusha - "Be Mine, Hero!" "I Refuse!"

altTitles.th: จอมมารนักเศรษ

altTitles.ja: まおゆう魔王勇者 (カドカワコミックス・エース)
まおゆう魔王勇者「この我のものとなれ、勇者よ」「断る!」
魔王勇者「成为我的东西吧勇者」「我拒绝！」

description.en:
After a long and treacherous journey, our Hero finally arrives at the Overlord’s castle only to find himself being asked for help. The Hero explains how the war that the demons have brought upon the humans have killed thousands and put more in misery. The Overlord however argues that this war has made the human society band together as one and showed empirical evidence how it has increased population, increased production, boosted economy and improved society overall. Furthermore, she explains to the Hero that ending this war will result in a civil war that will produce more bloodshed than there ever was. The Hero, convinced that the only way to bring peace, relatively speaking, is to join forces with the Overlord, agrees to help with her plans!  
  
One of five simultaneous serializations of the Maoyuu Maou Yuusha series.  
(The author has chosen this version to be the official version)  
  
Adaptation of the light novel series written by Touno Mamare.

Stowing himself away on a slave ship, Julian sets sail for the great continent with a hundred slaves, all yearning for freedom, until...?! Embark on a groundbreaking journey through this action-packed dark fantasy saga!!

title.en: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 7 - Steel Ball Run

altTitles.ja: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 Part7『スティール・ボール・ラン』

altTitles.ja-ro: JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken: Steel Ball Run

altTitles.zh: JoJo的奇妙冒险 第七部 飙马野郎

altTitles.es: La Extraña Aventura de JoJo Parte 7 - Steel Ball Run
La extraña aventura de JoJo Parte 7: La carrera de las bolas de acero

altTitles.ru: Невероятное приключение ДжоДжо — Часть 7: Гонка «Стальной шар»

altTitles.ko: 조조의 기묘한 모험 7 부 : 스틸 볼 달리기

altTitles.ro: Aventurile Bizare ale lui JoJo Partea 7: Cursa "Mingea de Oțel"

altTitles.kk: ДжоДжоның Шытырман Хикаясы: Болат Доп Бәйгесі

altTitles.uk: Неймовірні пригоди Джоджо частина 7: Перегони "Сталева Куля"

description.en:
In the American Old West, the world's greatest race is about to begin. Thousands line up in San Diego to travel over six thousand kilometers for a chance to win the grand prize of fifty million dollars. With the era of the horse reaching its end, contestants are allowed to use any kind of vehicle they wish. Competitors will have to endure grueling conditions, traveling up to a hundred kilometers a day through uncharted wastelands. The Steel Ball Run is truly a one-of-a-kind event.  
  
The youthful Johnny Joestar, a crippled former horse racer, has come to San Diego to watch the start of the race. There he encounters Gyro Zeppeli, a racer with two steel balls at his waist instead of a gun. Johnny witnesses Gyro using one of his steel balls to unleash a fantastical power, compelling a man to fire his gun at himself during a duel. In the midst of the action, Johnny happens to touch the steel ball and feels a power surging through his legs, allowing him to stand up for the first time in two years. Vowing to find the secret of the steel balls, Johnny decides to compete in the race, and so begins his bizarre adventure across America on the Steel Ball Run.
description.hu:
Amerikában a régi vadnyugaton, a világ legnagyobb szabású versenye hamarosan kezdődik. Ezrek állnak rajzvonalhoz San Diegoban, hogy utazzanak több mint hat ezer kilómétert annak reményében, hogy megnyerhetik az ötven millió dolláros fődíjat. A lovak kora elérkezett a végéhez, így a versenyzők szabadon használhattak bármiféle járművet. A versenyzőknek el kell majd tűrniük a fárasztő körülményeket, naponta több mint, száz kilómétert megtéve felfedezetlen vidékeken. A Steel Ball Run egy igazán egyedülálló esemény.

A fiatalos Johnny Joestar, egy tolószékes korábbi lovas versenyző, eljött San Diegoba, hogy megnézze a verseny rajtját. Itt találkozik Gyro Zeppelivel, egy versenyzővel két acél golyóval a derekán fegyver helyett. Johnny szemtanúja lesz annak, hogy Gyro használja az egyik acélgolyóját, szabadjára engedve annak erejét, hogy arra kényszerítsen egy férfit egy párbaj közben, hogy lőjje le magát. Az ütközet közepette, Johnny megérinti az
acélgolyót és érezte, hogy egy erő végigáramlik a lábán, rábírva őt arra, hogy felálljon először két év után. Megfogadja, hogy rájön, hogy mi a titka az acélgolyóknak, Johnny eldönti, hogy indul a versenyen, így kezdődik el az ő bizarr kalandja Amerikán keresztül a Steel Ball Runban.
description.uk: Вересень 1980. Дикий Захід. Америка. Жокеї зі всього світу чекають гонку "Сталева Куля", яка ось-ось розпочнеться. Тисячі людей вишиковуються в Сан-Дієго, щоб подолати понад шість тисяч кілометрів заради шансу отримати головний приз — п’ятдесят мільйонів доларів. Юний Джонні Джостар, каліка, колишній жокей та популярний скакун, приїхав до Сан-Дієґо, щоб подивитися на старт перегонів. Там він зустрічає Джайро Цеппелі, гонщика з двома сталевими кулями на талії замість револьвера, звичної зброї для жителів. Джонні бачить, як Джайро використовує одну зі своїх сталевих куль, змушуючи людину вистрілити з рушниці в себе під час дуелі. Поклявшись знайти таємницю сталевих куль, Джонні вирішує взяти участь у гонці. Так і починається його химерна пригода.
description.pt-br:
Conta a história da Épica batalha entre a família Joestar e sua longa geração contra as forças Malignas, tais como Vampiros e Usuários de Stands.
Cada arco da série corresponde a um vilão e a um membro importante da família Joestar.
Gênero: Ação, Aventura, Sobrenatural, Luta
Autor: Hirohiko Araki 
Demografia: Shonen/Seinen
Ano de publicação: 1987 - Presente
Número de Volumes: 101 - Ainda em publicação

description.en: A handsome boy, the most handsome in his school, who is constantly receiving and rejecting girls' confessions. What they don't know is that he is in love with another boy.

altTitles.ja: 魔入りました！入間くん 外伝

altTitles.en: Welcome to Demon School! Iruma-kun - Kalego Gaiden
Welcome to Demon School! Iruma-kun - Kalego Side Story

description.en: A special, two-part side story manga set in the world of *Mairimashita! Iruma-kun*, focusing on Naberius Kalego during his days as a student of Babyls Demon School.

At a tea manufacturing company, Juwon, a new employee in the product development department, falls in love with his superior, Assistant Manager Yeol, at first sight.One day, as Juwon secretly continues his unrequited love, Yeol reprimands Juwon for spraying perfume in the product development department. Juwon denies it, but Yeol continues to sniff Juwon whenever they meet, saying that he smells something.In this way, a subtle procedure called "smell inspection" has arisen between Juwon and Yeol. Juwon is troubled by the daily inspection time as his body instinctively reacting to his beloved Assistant Manager’s closeness...

title.en: The Kouhai who Went from Introvert to Influencer

altTitles.ja: 後輩は陰キャ上がりのインフルエンサー

altTitles.pt-br: A Caloura Anti-social é uma Influencer em Ascenção

altTitles.ja-ro: Kouhai wa Inkya Agari no Infuruensaa

altTitles.es-la: Una kohai que fue introvertida ahora es streamer

description.en:
After years of missed connections, our protagonist reunites with the junior he got along well with in high school. However, apparently, she has become a famous influencer.

---
**Links:**
* Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/user/1722837/series/225813)
description.tr: Yıllarca süren ayrılıktan sonra kahramanımız, lise yıllarında iyi anlaştığı alt sınıfıyla yeniden bir araya gelir. Ancak görünüşe göre o artık bir internet ünlüsüdür.
description.pt-br: Após anos de desencontros, nosso protagonista reencontra a caloura com quem se dava bem no ensino médio. Porém, aparentemente, ela se tornou uma famosa influenciadora.

title.en: I Just Want to Game in Peace

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ Zhǐ Xiǎng Ānjìng De Dǎ Yóuxì

altTitles.en: I Just Want to Play Games Quietly
I Just Want to Play the Game Quietly

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo Zhi Xiang Anjing De Da Youxi

description.en: Dimensional storms have descended and many extradimensional areas have appeared on Earth. All kinds of mysterious extradimensional lives are born in these extradimensional areas. In order to become strong, humans started to enter these dangerous areas to hunt and kill extradimensional creatures. But I, Zhou Wen, have made these extradimensional areas into instance dungeons in my mobile game. By levelling up my game character, I will be levelling up my strength in reality. When others are risking their lives, I’m here getting stronger by gaming.

description.ar: روم-كوم عن صبي مدرسة ثانوية خجول ولطيف من مدرسة البيسبول يلتقي بطالبة منتقلة جديدة بمفردها. فيعلم عن تعرضها للاعتداء ولكن بطريقة ما تبدو هذه الفتاة غريبة نوعًا ما لأنها فجأةً طلبت منه المال لمساعدتها!
description.en: Hoshino, a member of the baseball club meets Yamada, a classmate who has just transferred to his new school. She cries loudly that she was "mugged" and makes a certain "request" to him. The world's funniest master-slave relationship between a clueless girl and a good-natured little guy is about to begin.

A cocky and confident Yajima harbors dislike for Torikai, a cool and talented fellow trainee in the Rescue Team. The two constantly quarrel, but one day they cross the line while squabbling and end up sleeping together. Yajima regrets it, but at the same time he cannot get Torikai's pleading expression out of his head. However, because they have been rivals until now, he just can't bring himself to be honest with Torikai.
description.fr: Yajima, arrogant et sûr de lui, n'aime pas Torikai, un collègue de l'équipe de secours, cool et talentueux. Les deux se disputent constamment, mais un jour ils dépassent les bornes en se chamaillant et finissent par coucher ensemble. Yajima le regrette, mais en même temps, il ne peut s'empêcher de penser à l'expression suppliante de Torikai. Cependant, comme ils ont été rivaux jusqu'à présent, il ne peut pas se résoudre à être honnête avec Torikai.

altTitles.ja: 金魚屋さんのかりそめ夫婦

description.en:
The story of a contract marriage set in an old-fashioned goldfish shop. 

Asahi and Nana are newlyweds who run a goldfish shop. At first glance, they seem to be a normal couple, but in fact, they are a contractual couple who got married because of their mutual interests! They are not true husband and wive,  let alone lovers. And yet...

[I'm sorry. I know this is our first time meeting, but will you marry me?]
A woman (Gasolina) and her dog (Krunk) travel through an ecologically hazardous post apocalyptic America.

title.en: Tonari no Neko to Koi Shirazu

altTitles.ja: となりの猫と恋知らず

altTitles.en: The Feline Neighbor and the Unversed-in-Love

description.en: Minato Seno, who has always been very shy since he was young, struggled to make friends during his first few days of high school. He also never got a glimpse of his classmate Nekozane-san's face, as she was always asleep at the desk next to him. However, one day after school, a chance encounter revealed a side of Nekozane-san that was completely different from the one Minato knew in the classroom.

Hirose Itsuki is a high school girl who is afraid of getting hurt. One day, Hino, a celebrity at school who quit basketball because of an injury, asks her, "Do you know any good ways to pass the time?" Hino asks her if she knows of any good ways to pass the time, and they end up studying together. Itsuki then gradually becomes aware of Hino. A pure love story of a medical student begins!

Seishun Scans Description Ch 1: The story of a teenage girl who always only had a background presence, taking on small roles like being a plant in their school plays, never really standing out until a cute boy in her class starts giving her the right supporting words. 

A compilation of one-shots that will make you heart flutter.
The romantic comedy centers on a high school boy who is wasting his youth.

A romantic comedy of uncertain characters. Sagimiya Ryou, the main character, woke up as a girl one day because of the effects of an unknown sex change syndrome. Ryou, now living with this rare syndrome, meets Mizukami Nagisa on a tour of Tensei Gakuen high school. As the two find each other in a cosplay cafe, Ryou discovers Nagisa's secret.

A (physical) mixed romantic comedy!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [ComicWalker](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_AM01201412010000_68), [Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/45760)
description.ja: ある日突然、性転換症候群の影響で女の子になってしまった主人公・鷺宮了を中心とした、男女あやふやなキャラクターたちが織り成すクロッシングラブコメディ。“性転換症候群”という稀な体質の鷺宮了は、高校の学校見学で出会った水上凪沙に憧れを抱き、凪沙のいる天清学園へ入学することになった。２人が再会を果たしたのは凪沙が働くコスプレ喫茶で、さらに凪沙にはヒミツが――？

description.en:
Haejoon Goh, who ran from home, and Eunyung Baek, the problem child who lives in a tent.   
These two, who met under terrible circumstances, are forced to live together in an abandoned dormitory.   
This is a story of difficult growth between two people who hate both the dorm and each other.

title.en: I, Who Have the Natural Charismatic Traits, Was Targeted by Yandere Disciples

altTitles.zh: 天生媚骨的我被病娇徒儿盯上了

altTitles.zh-ro: Tiansheng Meigu De Wo Bei Bing Jiao Tu Er Ding Shangle
Tiānshēng Mèigǔ De Wǒ Bèi Bìng Jiāo Tú Er Dīng Shàngle

altTitles.vi: Trời Sinh Mị Cốt, Ta Bị Đồ Nhi Yandere Để Mắt Tới

description.en: After losing all magical powers, Bing Yuanzi was caught by a female disciple with ulterior motives. Witnessing a disciple she had painstakingly raised harboring malicious intentions, the master drank the last vial of a transformative potion, intending to erase her own existence. Unexpectedly, instead of disappearing, she became the legendary natural beauty, with allure and beauty reaching maximum levels. At the same time, the next words from her female disciple sounded behind her: “Master, you wouldn’t want your loss of magical powers to be known by our enemies, would you?

"I woke up with nothing but fragments of memories from my life up to now. There was a man standing by my bed, who introduced himself as my lover. But one of my few recollections is of being left for dead in a snowy field by this very same man…  
  
Still, he looks like the only one who can provide me with the answers I need. Who the hell is he? What was the real relationship between the two of us?"

Though Chichi the cat looks very cute, she has one goal: eradicate humanity and take over the world! She decides to recruit comrades to aid her in her quest, but it looks like world conquest won't be that easy?! 

Follow the adventures of Chichi the tyrant, Dunno the doggo who loves humans, and Kaiser Kang Taeshik, the hard-boiled wild hamster, as they face many hardships on their path to absolute dominion!

title.en: Kimi to Warui Koto ga Shitai

altTitles.en: I Wanna Do Bad Things with You

altTitles.ja: 君と悪いことがしたい

description.en: Mamori Wataya is a tall but dark, plain, and shady high school girl. One day she meets Kanashi Fuji, who has a small, thin body and an evil-looking smile. A supporting character that no one can find and a villain that no one likes. This encounter turns their gray days blue.
description.ja: 背は高いけど地味で暗い脇役女子・まもり。嫌いだからとプールの水を抜く、学校一の嫌われ者の悪役男子・藤。悪いヤツの、不思議な強さに惹かれていったその先にあったのは、透き通るような青い日々。

description.en: Yuu Haruna just moved into town and is addicted to twitter. When he goes out to buy dinner he bumps into a mysterious girl, Fuuka Akitsuki, who breaks his phone thinking he was trying to take a picture of her panties. How will his new life change now?
description.pt-br: O protagonista Yuu Haruna se muda para uma cidade e conhece uma garota estranha chamada Fuuka (cujo nome tem caracteres kanji para "vento" e "verão"). Esta menina, que é como um vento de verão possui um poder misterioso para atrair as pessoas.

description.en: After losing her mother early on, Hotaru, a girl surrounded by warmth and tranquility, finds her life taking a dramatic turn. An unexpected event draws her into the world of “Goze,” setting her on a path through unknown lands with music as her guide. Armed with her talent and a heart full of questions, she embarks on a quest, seeking her missing father and her true calling...!

High schoolers (and stepsisters) Yuzu and Mei have gone public with their relationship! The two are happy to be dating out in the open, but friends and family keep trying to butt in with advice. Can Yuzu and Mei figure things out on their own?
description.it: Seguito di Citrus ambientato dopo la fine del manga! Yuzu è riuscita a convincere Mei a tornare da lei e le ha chiesto di sposarla! In Citrus+ seguiremo le vicende delle due ragazze una volta riunite e delle loro amiche che non le lasciano mai sole.
description.pt-br: As estudantes do ensino médio (e meias-irmãs) Yuzu e Mei foram a público com seu relacionamento! As duas estão felizes em namorar ao ar livre, mas amigos e familiares continuam tentando se aproximar com conselhos. Yuzu e Mei podem resolver as coisas sozinhas?

description.en:
With everyone's memories having been altered, Boruto finds himself being hunted by his own village. After escaping with Sasuke, what future awaits Boruto...?

(Source: MangaPlus)

---

**Links:**
- [Viz - Alternative Official English](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/boruto-two-blue-vortex)
description.es:
La memoria colectiva de la gente ha cambiado, y ahora la Villa de la Hoja va detrás de la vida de Boruto. Pese a las adversidades, alguien ha estado esperando junto a Sasuke después de abandonar la Villa.

(Source: MangaPlus)
description.fr: Les « souvenirs » des gens ont changé et désormais, la vie de Boruto est menacée au village caché de Konoha. La situation est telle que Boruto quitte le village avec Sasuke sans savoir ce qui les attend…
description.id:
Sesuatu telah mengubah "memori" para warga. Boruto yang kini menjadi buron melarikan diri dari Konoha bersama Sasuke. Di tengah konflik itu, yang telah menanti keduanya adalah...

(Source: MangaPlus)
description.th:
"ความทรงจำ" ของผู้คนเปลี่ยนไป ทำให้โบรุโตะต้องตกอยู่ในฐานะที่โดนหมู่บ้านโคโนะฮะงาคุเระหมายชีวิต ท่ามกลางเคราะห์ร้ายที่ประสบ สิ่งที่รอคอยโบรุโตะซึ่งหนีออกจากหมู่บ้านไปพร้อมๆ กับซาสึเกะก็คือ...

(Source: MangaPlus)
description.pt-br: As "memórias" das pessoas foram alteradas e Boruto está numa posição onde a Vila Oculta da Folha quer tomar a sua vida. Durante essa adversidade, o que Boruto aguardava quando deixou a vila com o Sasuke era...

description.en:
After being aggressively rejected, Momo Ayase finds herself sulking when she stumbles across a boy being bullied. Saved by her rash kindness, the occult-obsessed boy attempts to speak to her about supernatural interests he believes they share. Rejecting his claims, Ayase proclaimed that she is instead a believer in ghosts, starting an argument between the two over which is real.

In a bet to determine who's correct, the two decide to separately visit locations associated with both the occult and the supernatural—Ayase visiting the former and the boy visiting the latter. When the two reach their respective places, it turns out that neither of them was wrong and that both the occult and ghosts do exist.

This marks the beginning of Ayase and the boy's adventure, who shares a name with Ayase's favorite idol—Ken Takakura, as they attempt to fix the surreal supernatural and sci-fi elements around them to return to a normal life.
description.fr:
Momo Ayase et Ken Takakura sont tous deux lycéens. Tandis que la première croit aux fantômes, le second est fasciné par les extraterrestres. Évidemment, chacun se moque des croyances de l’autre. Incapables de se convaincre, ils se lancent un défi pour savoir lequel des deux a raison. Momo se retrouve dans un hôpital où des créatures de l’espace sont censées se trouver et Ken dans un tunnel hanté. C’est le début d’une romance survoltée où l’occulte, le paranormal et le surnaturel se bousculent dans un chaos haletant !

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**
description.ru: Призраки, монстры, инопланетяне, подростковая романтика, сражения!.. В этой серии есть все! Такакура, одержимый оккультизмом, не верящий в призраков, и Аясэ, девушка, не верящая в пришельцев, пытаются преодолеть свои разногласия, когда сталкиваются с паранормальными явлениями! Эта манга - не от мира сего!
description.pt-br: Takakura, um rapaz que é um fanático do ocultismo que não acredita em fantasmas, e Ayase, uma garota que não acredita em alienígenas, encontram uma estranheza esmagadora que transcende sua compreensão mútua…! Uma história de vinda oculta da idade!

altTitles.th: ดราก้อนบอล

description.da: Den fantastiske historie starter for længe siden, tusindvis af kilometer fra hovedstaden i et fjerntliggende, lille asiatisk rige, langt ude i skoven. Her bor Son-Goku, en løjerlig lille 14-årig meget stærk dreng med en praktisk abehale. Siden sin bedstefars død har han boet helt alene. Han kløver brænde med de bare næver, er nærmest usårlig og har mange bemærkelsesværdige evner.
description.de: Der kleine Einsiedler Son-Goku und das Stadtmädchen Bulma brechen gemeinsam zu einem großen Abenteuer auf: Sie wollen die sieben geheimnisvollen Dragon Balls finden, mit deren Hilfe jeder Wunsch in Erfüllung geht...
description.en:
Dragon Ball follows the adventures of Goku from his childhood through adulthood as he trains in martial arts and explores the world in search of the seven mystical orbs known as the Dragon Balls, which can summon a wish-granting dragon when gathered. Along his journey, Goku makes several friends and battles a wide variety of villains, many of whom also seek the Dragon Balls for their own desires. Along the way becoming the strongest warrior in the universe.

Part II (the post-time skip portion) of Dragon Ball is also known as 'Dragon Ball Z' in North America.

[Official English](https://www.viz.com/dragon-ball)

---

- **The 4th Best Selling Manga in History**
description.fi:
Pieni mutta vahva Son Goku sekä kaupunkilaistyttö Bulma lyöttäytyvät yhteen suurta seikkailua varten. He metsästävät salaperäisiä lohikäärmekuulia, jotka voivat toteuttaa omistajansa suurimman toiveen...

Sarjakuva etenee takakannesta etukanteen ja oikealta vasemmalle. Suositellaan yli 12-vuotiaille. 

[Lisätieto: Toisen painoksen kirjasta on sensuroitu perheen pienimmille sopimattomia kohtauksia vuoden 2003 pedofiliasyytösten vuoksi.]
description.fr: Les Dragon Ball, boules de cristal magiques, offrent à celui qui les détient la possibilité de réaliser tous ses voeux. Bien sûr la quête que mène Sangoku et ses amis pour les réunir n'est pas sans obstacles: tournois et combats rythment chaque tome de cette série-culte pour les jeunes adolescents. Scénarios et dialogues assez simples centrés sur la confrontation entre les différents protagonistes. Les textes se résument parfois aux cris des combattants mais le succès de la série dépasse largement cela, pour en faire un véritable mythe auprès de la jeune génération.
description.id: Son Goku adalah seorang anak laki-laki yang luar biasa yang tinggal di dalam gunung. Suatu hari dia berjumpa dengan Bulma yang sedang dalam perjalanan mencari Dragon Ball. Akhirnya mereka bersama-sama menjadi tujuh buah Dragon Ball. Ternyata Dragon Ball ke enam ada di gunjung Frypan yang sedang terbakar...
description.lt:
Susipažinkite su tyros širdies beždžionuodegiu berniuku Sangoku, atvykėliu iš kito pasaulio. Jis nepaprastai stiprus, o dar nepaprastesni jo nuotykiai. Sutikęs padėti aikštingai šešiolikmetei mergaitei Bulmai Sangokas leidžiasi į neįtikėtiną kelionę ieškoti septynių drakono rutulių, kuriuos surinkus galingasis drakonas išpildys bet kokį norą. Bet tai įvyksta tik kartą per metus! Paskui rutuliai vėl išsibarsto, juos vėl reikia rinkti, kad noras būtų išpildytas. Keliaudamas narsusis Gokas suras pavidalą keičiančių draugų, mokysis pas galingiausią Rytų dvikovų meistrą, kausis pasaulio stipruolio turnyre, susirems su didžiausiais siaubūnais ir nuožmiausiais priešais. O kur dar žiaurioji Raudonojo kaspino armija ir mirtingai pavojinga Raumenų bokšto tvirtovė, kurioje tyko visas būrys nindzių, kiborgų ir dar bjauresnių tipų... Ar pavyks Sangokui rasti drakono rutulius ir likti nenugalėtam?

Komikso „Drakonų kovos“ veiksmas vyksta kiniškoje aplinkoje, bet nebūtinai Kinijoje. Tiksli vieta nežinoma. Pati istorija labai paprasta, bet kurdamas norėčiau ją papildyti vis naujomis detalėmis ir piešiniais. Taip galiu piešti ką tik noriu ir mėgautis jauduliu bei nežinomybe, ką piešiu toliau.
Akira Torajama, 1985
description.no: Den lille enstøingen Son-Goku møter tilfeldigvis den tøffe 16 år gamle storbyjenta Bulma. Hun er på jakt etter syv mystiske dragekuler - dragonballs. Sammen reiser de videre i jakten på de magiske kulene som kan oppfylle deres innerste ønsker.
description.pl:
Manga stworzona przez Akirę Toriyamę, luźno oparta na motywach zaczerpniętych z chińskiej powieści Wędrówka na zachód. Manga składa się z 42 tomów. 
Głównym bohaterem Dragon Balla jest chłopiec z ogonem imieniem Son Gokū, który wraz z nowo poznaną przyjaciółką Bulmą wyrusza w podróż w poszukiwaniu tajemniczych Smoczych Kul. Gdy zbierze się siedem kul, pojawia się smok – Shen Long (pol. Boski Smok), który spełni jedno życzenie. Mimo, iż od wielu lat nikt nie zdołał zebrać wszystkich kul, w dalszych losach udaje się to. Son Gokū już jako dziecko dysponuje potężną siłą (potrafi udźwignąć samochód), a z biegiem czasu staje coraz silniejszy, i wraz z przyjaciółmi broni losów Ziemi, a nawet wszechświata.
description.ru: Манга «Жемчуг дракона» во многом перекликается с произведением китайской классической литературы «Путешествие на Запад», авторство которого приписывают У Чэн-Эню. Имя главного героя манги, Сон Гоку,— это японское чтение имени Сунь У-кун, Царя Обезьян, главного героя «Путешествия на Запад». Можно провести параллели и между другими персонажами «Путешествия на Запад» и «Жемчуга дракона». Булма, задавшаяся целью найти семь волшебных жемчужин, имеет много общего с монахом Сюань-цзаном, который отправляется в путешествие в Индию за священными сутрами. Два других спутника Булмы, Улун и Ямча, это пародия на свиноподобного Чжу Ба-цзе и демона Ша-сэна. А Князь-Бык Гюмао — быкоголовый демон Нюмован, которого путешественники повстречали на своем пути. В «Жемчуге дракона» фигурируют не только персонажи, но и предметы из романа «Путешествие на Запад»: волшебное облако Цзиньдоуюнь, на котором можно летать по небу, посох Царя Обезьян жуйбан, меняющий длину по воле хозяина, и многое-многое другое. Некоторые имена и названия мы перевели на китайский лад, чтобы внести в повествование капельку экзотического колорита, присущего оригиналу, другие же оставили в японском прочтении. Это сделано потому что поклонники манги и снятого по ней аниме во всем мире уже давно знают и любят их героев именно под японскими именами. Мы надеемся, что такая смесь имен и названий не помешает восприятию манги, так как весь мир, созданный автором, и без того являет собой беспорядочное смешение всевозможных языков, культур и времен. А вот в переводе названия манги мы решили отклониться от общепринятого варианта ради сохранения авторской шутки. Дело в том, что Dragon Ball — это прежде всего сорт китайского зеленого чая, вручную скрученного в шарики. Кстати, улун и пуэр — тоже китайские сорта чая, а ямча — китайская разновидность чайной церемонии. Автор вовсю обыгрывал «чайное» название манги, так почему же нам не подыграть ему?
description.uk:
Кулі Дракона... Сім містичних сфер, здатні виконати одне заповітне бажання: від нескінченного запасу полуниці до вічної юності та влади над цілим світом!

У пошуках цих артефактів дівчинка Бульма знайомиться із Соном Ґокӯ – маленьким хлопчиком із мавпячим хвостиком. Він дещо дивакуватий, але доброзичливий, наївний і неймовірно сильний! Разом вони вирушать у подорож, сповнену пригод, ворогів, небезпеки та битв за долю цілого світу!
description.zh: 相传，有七颗龙珠散落在世界的各个角落，当它们被聚集到一起时神龙就会出现，能够实现你的任何一个愿望。这个一个美丽的的传说引出了小悟空和他的朋友们寻找龙珠的故事。
description.es-la:
Por fin! Edición nacional de DragonBall, uno de los mangas más reconocidos a nivel mundial, que originalmente fue publicado en el Shonen Jump de Shueisha entre 1984 y 1995. La historia de Son Goku, el guerrero que, junto a sus amigos, protege a la Tierra de los más diversos y poderosos enemigos desde que es un chico hasta que es un adulto. Una serie que arranca con aventura y prosigue con mucha acción, aunque también algo de comedia. Esta edición argentina es completamente fiel a la japonesa, respetando el sentido de lectura oriental e incluyendo varios extras y sección de aclaraciones de la traducción. Su periodicidad es mensual.

---
Goku, es un niño muy especial que ha tenido que valerse por sí mismo en medio de la naturaleza y sin contacto con otras personas. Un día conoció a Bulma, una chica que busca las siete Esferas del Dragón, estos son elementos mágicos que al ser reunidos invocan a un dios dragón llamado Shenlong, el cual concederá un único deseo, cualquiera que este sea. Goku se une a Bulma en la búsqueda de las esferas sin imaginar que hay otros seres muy peligrosos que también las desean.
description.pt-br:
Dragon Ball segue as aventuras de Son Goku desde sua infância até a idade adulta e como ele treina artes marciais e explora o mundo em busca das sete esferas místicas conhecidas como as esferas do dragão, que pode invocar um dragão que concede desejos quando reunidos. Ao longo de sua jornada, Goku faz vários amigos e batalhas com uma grande variedade de vilões, muitos dos quais também procuram as esferas do dragão para seus próprios desejos. Ao longo do caminho se tornar o guerreiro mais forte do universo.

---
Tudo começa com o pequeno rapaz, Son Goku, que mora sozinho numa montanha. Foi encontrado numa floresta pelo velho Son Gohan que o ensinou a arte do kung fu. Numa noite, Gohan foi morto por um monstro misterioso. Ágil e forte e sem maldade, Goku destaca das outras pessoas por ter um rabo de macaco. A história começa quando Goku conhece Bulma, uma rapariga que o convence a ajudá-la na procura das 7 Bolas do Dragão que, quando reunidas, podem realizar um desejo através da invocação ao Deus Dragão…

---
A obra-prima escrita e desenhada pelo mestre Akira Toriyama, está de volta ao Brasil! Son Goku é um pequeno órfão de coração puro, mas com uma tremenda força. Depois de viver tanto tempo isolado da civilização, ele recebe a inesperada visita de uma garota! Bulma lhe propõe uma parceria para buscar as sete Esferas do Dragão, que, quando reunidas, são capazes de realizar qualquer desejo! Perigos e adversários não faltarão no caminho dessa dupla inusitada, e os mais variados personagens marcarão presença nesta aventura cheia de humor! Não perca a chance de acompanhar Goku em sua jornada, na conquista de novos amigos e na superação de todos os desafios com sua personalidade cativante e incríveis habilidades! Prepare-se para esta viagem cheia de reviravoltas, que a aventura já vai começar!
description.zh-hk: 從前從前，在距離都市數千公里外的某座深山裡住著一名叫孫悟空的男子，他身上有一顆爺爺留給他的４星龍珠…這個異想天開的故事，就由此拉開了序幕…76P極致彩頁大方分享！完全版三大特點：1.全套封面都是鳥山明老師新畫！2.雜誌連載時彩稿原封不動，忠實呈現！3.裝訂豪華，並收錄未公開之插畫！

title.en: Sentou Robot Hunter no Senpai to Kyuukei Shitara…

altTitles.ja: 戦闘ロボハンターの先輩と休憩したら…

altTitles.id: Saat Beristirahat dengan Senpaiku Pemburu Robot Tempur...

altTitles.en: When I Was on a Break with Senpai...

altTitles.zh-hk: 靈甲鬼修羅 - 避邪回歸

description.en: "On the beautiful Jeju Island, MiHo Won, a beautiful teacher, and Van, a cold and mysterious guy, become entangled in strange events, fighting unknown monsters. A legend of exorcism comics is back as webtoon!"

title.en: Digimon Universe: Appli Monsters: Appmon Academy!!

altTitles.ja: アプリモンスターズ アプモン学園！！

description.en: Appli Monsters: Appmon Academy!! is a manga spin-off of Digimon Universe: Appli Monsters, focusing on the Appmon in a school setting.

Two girls who want to become idols are entering into their long dreamed school—Kiraboshi-juku—Kiraboshi Nadeshiko and her close friend Mangetsu Sakurako. These two are so close that despite both being girls, they're often compared to a married couple by people around them.  
  
And so begins their life in the dormitory as roommates. However, on their first night, an unusual, illicit impulse strikes Nadeshiko…

altTitles.zh-hk: 撿到無家可歸的美少年

altTitles.zh: 捡到无家可归的美少年

altTitles.en: I Picked up a Homeless Handsome Guy

description.en:
26-year old office worker Ao Ichinose is feeling crushed after her boyfriend who she had been dating for 3 years dumps her for a younger girl at work. Getting drunk in her friend's bar, she makes the impulsive decision to sleep with a younger man she picked up there. It was just supposed to be a one-night-stand, but then she happens to meet him again on a rainy day. What's more, he's begged her "Can't you pick me up ...?"
A fun story of a strong lady and the puppy-dog boy she lives with!
description.ja:
3年付き合った彼氏を職場の後輩に奪われた亜緒(26)は、親友が営むバーで傷心を癒やしていた。

そこに居合わせた、名前が同じ読み方の年下男子・青空(21)と意気投合し、そのまま一夜を共にしてしまう。

一夜限りだと割り切っていたが偶然再会、会話の中で「俺のこと拾ってくれない…？」と懇願されてしまい――!?

---
交往3年的男友被職場後輩給搶走，失意的亞緒(26)在好友經營的酒吧裡療傷。

在那裏遇見了，與自己名字讀音相同的年下男子——青空(21)，且情投意合共度了一夜春宵。

原以為僅僅只是共度一夜的關係，卻偶然間再次相會，而且談話之間竟然透露出「不要將我拋棄....?」的懇求────!?
description.zh-hk:
交往3年的男友被職場後輩給搶走，失意的亞緒(26)在好友經營的酒吧裡療傷。

在那裏遇見了，與自己名字讀音相同的年下男子——青空(21)，且情投意合共度了一夜春宵。

原以為僅僅只是共度一夜的關係，卻偶然間再次相會，而且談話之間竟然透露出「不要將我拋棄....?」的懇求────!?

description.en: Da-yeon was excited by the news of legalization of same-sex marriage. I filed a marriage registration with a woman I didn't know because I was drunk....!?
description.ko:
「 레진챌린지에서 독자들의 정신이 아찔해지게 웃기고 설렜던 선 결혼 후 연애 로맨스!! 」
동성혼 합법화 소식에 들떠 번개에 나간 모쏠 레즈 이다연.
술에 취해 모르는 여자와 혼인신고를 해버렸다....!?

altTitles.ja: このヒーラー、めんどくさい

description.en: Fantasy adventuring comedy starring Karla the dark elf cleric who invested too much on her taunting skills and Alvin the swordsman who has to put up with her.
description.ru:
Фантастическая приключенческая комедия с участием Карлы, тёмной эльфийки-клирика, которая слишком много вложила в навыки грубости, и Элвина, мечника, вынужденного мириться с ней.

---

(Source: [readmanga](https://readmanga.io/etot_protivnyi_celitel___A5275))

description.en:
Hitori Gotou is a high school girl who's starting to learn to play the guitar because she dreams of being in a band, 
but she's so shy that she hasn't made a single friend. 
However her dream might come true after she meets Nijika Ijichi, a drummer girl looking for a new guitarist for her band.
description.es: Bocchi The Rock! cuenta la historia de Goto Hitori, una chica de secundaria que empieza a aprender a tocar la guitarra persiguiendo su sueño de formar parte de una banda. Pese a que es muy dedicada, su arrolladora timidez le impide poder conseguir siquiera una amiga. Pero cuando conozca a Ijichi Nijika, una baterista que está buscando una nueva guitarrista para su grupo, Goto dará el primer paso para cumplir su gran sueño página a página, tira a tira.
description.it:
Hitori Goto è una liceale che inizia a imparare a suonare la chitarra perchè il suo sogno è di entrare a far parte di una band, 
ma è talmente timida da non avere nemmeno un amico. 
Ma il suo sogno potrebbe avverarsi in seguito all'incontro con Nijika Ijichi, una ragazza che suona la batteria 
ed è alla ricerca proprio di un chitarrista per la band in cui suona.
description.ja:
「ぼっちちゃん」こと後藤ひとりは、ギターを愛する孤独な少女。
家で一人寂しく弾くだけの毎日でしたが、ひょんなことから伊地知虹夏が率いる「結束バンド」に加入することに。
人前での演奏に不慣れな後藤は、立派なバンドマンになれるのか――！？
全国のぼっちな少年少女に届ける、いま最高にアツい音楽漫画！！
陰キャならロックをやれ！！！
description.pt-br:
Hitori Gotou é uma colegial que está começando a aprender a tocar violão porque sonha em fazer parte de uma banda, mas é tão tímida que não fez um único amigo. No entanto, seu sonho pode se tornar realidade depois que ela conhece Nijika Ijichi, uma garota que toca bateria e está procurando um novo guitarrista para sua banda.

[ 1° TEMP.  DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 2, Cap 21. ]

altTitles.en: First Love Case Study Of The Associate Professor

altTitles.ja: 助教授の初恋ケーススタディ

description.en:
"You have a nice body." With that, the associate professor offers him a part time job, looking after him.  
  
Shattered by the losses of his two-year relationship and nine-year job, Asahi has nowhere to go. But when his father is hospitalized, he ends up helping at his parents' restaurant. There, he meets professor Yuzuru Togame, who is slouching and scoffing down his food. Despite being seven years Asahi's senior, Yuzuru turns out to be pretty hopeless as he eats with his chopsticks clenched in his fist, and then falls asleep mid-meal! Asahi accepts Yuzuru's offer of a part-time job without much thought, but…!? This is a case study of love – between a broken-hearted but meddlesome younger man, and a hapless professor.
description.fr: "Vous avez un beau corps." Avec cela, le professeur lui propose un travail à temps partiel... pour prendre soin de lui....! Brisé par sa rupture d'il y a 2 ans et la perte de son travail où il y avait passé 9 ans, Asahi n'a nulle part où aller. Mais lorsque son père est hospitalisé, il finit par aider au restaurant de ses parents. Il y fait la connaissance du professeur Yuzuru Togame, affalé et s'empiffrant. Même s'il est âgé de 7 ans de plus qu'Asahi, Yuzuru s'avère être plutôt désespéré, car il mange avec ses baguettes serrées dans son poing, puis s'endort au milieu du repas ! Asahi accepte l'offre de Yuzuru de travailler à temps partiel sans trop y penser, mais...!? Il s'agit d'une étude de cas amoureuse entre un jeune homme au cœur brisé mais maladroit et un professeur malchanceux.

altTitles.en: The Meals Of A Single Woman (26) At Her Limit
The Suffering of a 26 Year Old Unloved Female Doomer

altTitles.vi: Bữa ăn đạm bạc của bà chị (26) độc thân

description.en: Daily life of a 26 year old NEET with a bombastic bod
description.ja:
鬱、孤独、たまに飯。
仕事につかれ、生活につかれた限界独身女子の柊さん。どんなに憂鬱でも、おなかだけは空いてしまうようです。
description.vi: Cuộc sống hằng ngày cùng những bữa ăn đạm bạc của bà chị độc thân thất nghiệp chán đời.

description.en: After a long period of war, civilization is developing and recovering. Ahar, the only survivor of the elves, sets out on a journey around the world with his partner Griff. To fulfill their mission to express their gratitude and bid farewell to the spirits who once joined hands with the people that are now forgotten in their memories.

title.en: Yopparai Touzoku, Dorei no Shoujo wo Kau

altTitles.ja: 酔っぱらい盗賊、奴隷の少女を買う

altTitles.en: A Drunk Thief Bought a Slave Girl

altTitles.id: Thief Pemabuk yang Membeli Budak Gadis

description.en:
A hangover leads to a shared life between a thief and a slave girl.
 
Harris is an adventurer who works as a thief and scout, a job that is often shunned due to poor reputation.
 
One day he gets drunk and buys a slave girl, Tiana. Tiana, who had been treated badly and not given enough food until then, comes to adore Harris, who treats her kindly, as her master. Harris, who had been hoping that Tiana would grow up to be a beautiful woman, is gradually drawn to her because of her innocence.
 
Harris' life changes drastically when he begins living with Tiana: warm meals, freshly washed clothes, and interaction with the townspeople who had never come close to him before. On the other hand, he finds himself in more and more troublesome situations, will he manages to escape from them with his skill and tact...?
 
This is the story of the "rebirth" of a shabby thief, which begins with an encounter with a slave girl.

title.en: Honzuki no Gekokujou ~Shisho ni Naru Tame ni wa Shudan wo Erandeiraremasen~ Dai 3-bu 「Ryouchi ni Hon o Hirogeyou!」

altTitles.en: Ascendance of a Bookworm ~I'll do anything to become a librarian~ Part 3 「Let's Spread the Book to the Territory!」

altTitles.ja: 本好きの下剋上 ～司書になるためには手段を選んでいられません～ 第三部 「領地に本を広げよう！」
本好きの下剋上 第三部

description.en: Following a disastrous encounter with a noble, Myne finally resolves to say goodbye to her family and friends in the lower city, changing her name to “Rozemyne” and beginning her new life as the adopted daughter of Ehrenfest’s archduke. However, her days as an archnoble in noble society are brutal, as she is put through rigorous etiquette and magic training on top of her duties as High Bishop and forewoman. It all proves too much for a weak little seven-year-old girl… Or it would have, had the High Priest not offered her the keys to the temple’s book room as a reward. If she could get her hands on those, she’d be able to read all sorts of precious books! Her name may have changed, but Rozemyne’s passion for books remains the same as she charges into a whole new world! The detailed setting expands as the printing industry grows in size. Here begins Part 3 of this biblio-fantasy for book lovers everywhere!

altTitles.es: El hombre de un solo golpe

altTitles.th: วันพันช์แมน

description.en:
After rigorously training for three years, the ordinary Saitama has gained immense strength which allows him to take out anyone and anything with just one punch. He decides to put his new skill to good use by becoming a hero. However, he quickly becomes bored with easily defeating monsters, and wants someone to give him a challenge to bring back the spark of being a hero.  
  
Upon bearing witness to Saitama's amazing power, Genos, a cyborg, is determined to become Saitama's apprentice. During this time, Saitama realizes he is neither getting the recognition that he deserves nor known by the people due to him not being a part of the Hero Association. Wanting to boost his reputation, Saitama decides to have Genos register with him, in exchange for taking him in as a pupil. Together, the two begin working their way up toward becoming true heroes, hoping to find strong enemies and earn respect in the process.  
  



---

**Notes:**  
- Because some groups use the web version of the manga while others use the magazine version, the numbering won't match between different languages.  
- **Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, fan translations of One Punch Man are currently unavailable to be uploaded. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website,](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/one-punch-man) with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US).**
description.fa: در جهان اَبَر قهرمان ها قهرمانی بسیار قدرتمند و شکست ناپذیر وجود داره که به (مرد تک مشتی) معروفه چون اون تمامی دشمنان و رقیب هاشو فقط با یک مشت از میدان به در میکنه. بعد از مدتی سایتاما  دیگه از مبارزاتش لذت نمیبره و احساساتی مثل هیجان و ترس رو در خودش فراموش میکنه! و همراه تنها شاگردش که یک سایبورگ هست به انتظار رقیبی خوب ، ماجراهایی رو دنبال میکنن و……
description.ru: Манга повествует о молодом человеке по имени Сайтама. Он — герой, обычный герой. Основная его проблема в том, что он вышибает дух из злодеев одним ударом. А это очень скучно…
description.tr:
Üç yıllık sıkı bir eğitimden sonra, Saitama, tek bir yumrukla herkesi ve her şeyi alt etmesine izin veren muazzam bir güç kazandı. Bir kahraman olarak yeni becerisini iyi bir şekilde kullanmaya karar verir. Bununla birlikte, canavarları kolayca yenmekten çabucak sıkılır ve kahraman olma kıvılcımını geri getirmek için birinin ona meydan okumasını ister.
  Bir cyborg olan Genos, Saitama'nın inanılmaz gücüne tanık olduktan sonra, Saitama'nın çırağı olmaya kararlıdır. Bu süre zarfında Saitama, Kahraman Derneği'nin bir parçası olmadığı için ne hak ettiği takdiri görmediğini ne de insanlar tarafından tanınmadığını fark eder. İtibarını artırmak isteyen Saitama, Genos'u öğrenci olarak alması karşılığında kendisine kaydettirmeye karar verir. İkisi birlikte, güçlü düşmanlar bulmayı ve bu süreçte saygı kazanmayı umarak gerçek kahramanlar olma yolunda ilerlemeye başlar.
description.pt-br: One-Punch Man conta a história de Saitama, um super-herói extremamente poderoso, que se entediou com a ausência dos desafios nas suas lutas contra o mau e procura encontrar um oponente digno para lutar.

description.en: Two weeks have passed since the start of high school. Miyao Mugi encounters the handsome, cool Kurose Kei coldly rejecting a confession. That very same day, Mugi meets him again, but in the most unexpected place and even acting completely differently?! What will happen now that she knows Kei's secret?
description.vi:
“Tôi cũng muốn có bạn trai!”

Mugi, một cô nữ sinh trung học với chỉ số kinh nghiệm yêu đương là số không và không có năng lực giao tiếp với đám con trai, tình cờ va vấp phải Kurose một hot boy trung học, tuy vô cùng đẹp trai nhưng lại cực kỳ không thân thiện với các cô gái.

Thật là thô lỗ và khó chịu mà, nhưng… hình như mình vừa vô tình biết được công việc bán thời gian bí mật của Kurose !? (っ ಠ‿ಠ) っ
